channel.title: Game maker!
channel.description:
I found this about 3 years ago. It lets you make your own basic games. Its very cool and useful :)
Gamemaker v.7 - http://www.yoyogames.com/gamemaker/try
If you want to use a registered version I reccomend you use a keygen. I have one for version 6! its way better than unregistered :)
Gamemaker v.6.1 - http://msn-cnet.com.com/Game-Maker/3640-2121_4-10626945.html
[blue]EDIT by therealjdb[/blue]-No warez allowed.
Quick executable game i made with it: http://uppit.com/d/J1YYG
-Def job :)
[img]http://www.fi.uu.nl/wiki/images/gamemaker_layout.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.remialkemade.nl/images/gamemaker.jpg[/img]

item.title: Game maker!
item.dc:creator: @geel9 geel9
item.description:
@geel9 wrote:

It can get quite complicated, especially when you are trying to make a GOOD game, not a crappy game. GM’s capabilities are LIMITLESS, it’s just that you guys are only playing the half-assed games. One game was nominated(I think it won third place) for IGF!

Read full topic

item.title: Game maker!
item.dc:creator: @geel9 geel9
item.description:
@geel9 wrote:

GameMaker’s creators can sell the games the people make with it. How do I know? They are having a contest. You win massive amounts of money, but they OWN your game. Why would they do this? You can make high-quality games with this.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Game maker!
item.dc:creator: @def_job def job
item.description:
@def_job wrote:

[size=12pt][b]Rule 4:[/b][/size] We don't make posts that contain not useful information.

This is very useful:(Sarcasm…)

THIS IS EPIC FAIL

This isnt Useful feedback. Useful feedback would be something like this:

This is too simple I dont like

And Thuglife you say your just leaving negative feedback.

If he wouldnt of said it, i know me or someone else would of.

You said if he didnt flame me you would of.

YOU PEOPLE RUIN MOPAR

Harsh dude… harsh
I got nothing against you, that was uncalled for

Read full topic

item.title: Game maker!
item.dc:creator: @def_job def job
item.description:
@def_job wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:8, topic:137471”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=189041.msg1708291#msg1708291 date=1188266717]

THIS IS EPIC FAIL

pfft nub, you think your funny since you say epic fail, i didnt laugh so you /fail
[/quote]I think you are an epic fail because game maker is for 8 year olds tbh[/quote]

Yeah it is, And I Know this is [p]REALLY[p] hard for you to understand, But some people who use these forums dont know how to make a game from scratch. And for them this is Great.
And there are people like perhaps yourself, who can make a game from scratch. But just because you can make a game from scratch doesn’t mean you need to downtalk, flame, and be generally nasty to the not so skilled people. This is just showing disrespect.
If you find this program Insultingly easy or something don’t flame my thread.
Show some bloody respect for people not so good as you. Not only is showing respect something you should do anyway but:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:1, topic:223”][center][size=14pt]Moparisthebest.com and Moparscape.org Rules[/size][/center]
[size=12pt]Rule 6:[/size]
We respect each other and other communities. We don’t flame each other or other communities. We don’t fight on the forums.[/quote]

RULE NUMBER SIX CLEARLY says:

We respect each other

Not:

We respect the top level coders and treat the new people like crap

Well there we go. I hope you see my point. Im not in the wrong. You broke the rules here.

[quote=“ThugLife, post:19, topic:137471”]No Fellix you are the one that started to flame it, all he said was “THIS IS EPIC FAIL”.

If he wouldnt of said it, i know me or someone else would of.[/quote]

I Thought Moparscape Vets where supposed to be helpful and enforce the rules?
Not Flame posts.
This breaks no rules and People find it useful.

Thanks if you had the decency to read that.

  • Def job

Read full topic
